v-model:active-key.description: The key of the currently selected label
v-model:active-key.description_zh: 当前选中的标签的 key

default-active-key.description: The key of the selected tag by default (uncontrolled, the first tab is selected when it is empty)
default-active-key.description_zh: 默认选中的标签的key（非受控状态，为空时选中第一个标签页）

type.type: line / card / card-gutter / text / rounded / capsule

show-add-button.description: Whether to display the Add button (available only in editable mode)
show-add-button.description_zh: 是否显示增加按钮（仅在可编辑模式可用）

destroy-on-hide.description: Whether to destroy content when the label is not displayed
destroy-on-hide.description_zh: 是否在不显示标签时销毁内容

lazy-load.description: Whether or not to mount the content when the tag is first displayed
lazy-load.description_zh: 是否在首次展示标签时挂载内容

justify.description: The height supports the container and only works in horizontal mode.
justify.description_zh: 高度撑满容器，只在水平模式下生效。

animation.description: Whether to enable option content transition animation
animation.description_zh: 是否开启选项内容过渡动画

header-padding.description: Whether there is a horizontal margin in the tab header. This effect applies only to tabs whose type is equal to line or text
header-padding.description_zh: 选项卡头部是否存在水平边距。仅对 type 等于 line、text 类型的选项卡生效

auto-switch.description: Whether to switch to a new tab after creating a label (the last one)
auto-switch.description_zh: 创建标签后是否切换到新标签（最后一个）

hide-content.description: Whether or not to hide content

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the current tag value changes
events.description_zh: 当前标签值改变时触发

events.name: tab-click
events.description: Triggered when a user clicks on a tag

events.name: add
events.description: Triggered when the user clicks the Add button
events.description_zh: 用户点击增加按钮时触发

events.name: delete
events.description: Triggered when the user clicks the delete button
events.description_zh: 用户点击删除按钮时触发
